about_the_game:
Start the journey

.The prologue is set before the story of the main game Soulbind: Tales Of The Underworld. You will learn where your hero's journey began, how he met his indispensable companion and other characters.

Assemble yourself piece by piece

.Yes, you are an ordinary skeleton, an outsider, but you have a specialty - you can replace your body parts with body parts of defeated enemies. A couple of successful battles and you are already half an invincible monster, a third a zombie and a third a witch on your grandmother's side.



Found and knocked out body parts have different rarity, which depends on the main characteristics and unique passive effects. To put it simply, if you like to change the strategy of the game, to be a tank or a mage - there is something to play with.

Get special skills

.How about breathing fire, turning to stone, or summoning a swarm of disgusting flies to your aid? Easy, all you have to do is defeat an enemy and get his head or torso on you. Although a little luck is needed here too.

Mutate

.By defeating enemies, you accumulate internal power and voila, you can choose a special mutation of your character. For example, strengthen the skills you use, improve basic attacks, add a stun chance, and more.

Get to know the mysterious world

The action of the prologue takes place in the library. It's a confusing location with its own traps and secrets, and of course dust, magic and books not handed in on time. Perhaps the library is the perfect place to learn more about the world of Allaar.

And say that again

.Death is commonplace in the world of Allaar. Yes, you'll lose everything you've gained, but you won't lose your experience as a player. The second attempt will be better than the first, and on the fifth time you can even get one eyeful of the boss. The main thing is that the attempts can be different from each other and if you like it, it is worth paying attention to Soulbind: Tales Of The Underworld, there you will find new enemies and new mechanics.

highlighted.name: One head is ok, but five are even better!

detailed_description:
Start the journey

.The prologue is set before the story of the main game Soulbind: Tales Of The Underworld. You will learn where your hero's journey began, how he met his indispensable companion and other characters.

Found and knocked out body parts have different rarity, which depends on the main characteristics and unique passive effects. To put it simply, if you like to change the strategy of the game, to be a tank or a mage - there is something to play with.

Get special skills

.How about breathing fire, turning to stone, or summoning a swarm of disgusting flies to your aid? Easy, all you have to do is defeat an enemy and get his head or torso on you. Although a little luck is needed here too.

Mutate

.By defeating enemies, you accumulate internal power and voila, you can choose a special mutation of your character. For example, strengthen the skills you use, improve basic attacks, add a stun chance, and more.

The action of the prologue takes place in the library. It's a confusing location with its own traps and secrets, and of course dust, magic and books not handed in on time. Perhaps the library is the perfect place to learn more about the world of Allaar.

And say that again

The second attempt will be better than the first, and on the fifth time you can even get one eyeful of the boss. The main thing is that the attempts can be different from each other and if you like it, it is worth paying attention to Soulbind: Tales Of The Underworld, there you will find new enemies and new mechanics.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS + SteamOS (latest)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS + SteamOS (latest)
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13.6+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (must support Metal API)
  • Additional Notes: MacBook, MacBook Pro or iMac 2012 or later

name: Soulbind: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 / Radeon HD 7800
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Soulbind: Prologue is an action platformer in the Roguelike genre. The hero is a common skeleton and an outsider. But there is one special feature - you can replace your body parts with parts of your opponents' bodies. Learn the backstory and start your journey in the world of Allaar.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
